== About This Wiki ==
The TrimPath Community pages or wiki is editable by its users. This is a [http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?WikiWikiWeb feature]. We hope you enjoy sharing and collaborating here. If you want to learn more, first read TracWiki.

If you just want to play around with it, please use the SandBox.
